reviews.text: 500 ml bottle. Clear amber body, medium white head. Aroma of pine resin, notes of tropical fruit and citrus. Taste is medium sweet, medium bitter, with citrusy and tropical flavors as well as pine resin. Medium body, slick texture, average carbonation.

Tap. Hazy orange in the glass, with a decent white head. Pretty intense floral aroma, with noticeable notes of flowers and a slight herbal touch. Taste is semi-sweet, with a low bitterness; flavors of flowery notes, slight citrus, slight herbals notes. Medium body, slick texture, average carbonation. Feels weird in a tasty way. If youâre into floral/herbal notes and flavors this one should be a must-try.

Backlog. 500 ml bottle. Pours golden amber, with a frothy white head. Aroma of malt, very slight hops, wet rags and cooked veggies. Taste is malty, slightly grassy and grainy, as well as a bit DMS-like. Medium body, watery texture, average carbonation.
